AGENT_BOTS.DESCRIPTION: AI Bots are like the most fabulous members of your team. They can handle the small stuff, so you can focus on the stuff that matters. Give them a try.

AVATAR.ERROR_DELETE: Error deleting bot avatar, please try again

BOT_CONFIGURATION.TITLE: Select an AI Bot
BOT_CONFIGURATION.DESC: Assign an AI Bot to your inbox. They can handle initial conversations and transfer them to a live member when necessary.
BOT_CONFIGURATION.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not update the AI Bot. Please try again.
BOT_CONFIGURATION.DISCONNECTED_ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not disconnect the AI Bot. Please try again.

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not add bot. Please try again later.

LIST.404: No bots found. You can create a bot by clicking the 'Add AI Bot' button.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Confirm Deletion
CONFIRM.MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not delete bot. Please try again.
Could not update bot. Please try again.

ACCESS_TOKEN.TITLE: Access Token
ACCESS_TOKEN.DESCRIPTION: Copy the access token and save it securely
ACCESS_TOKEN.RESET_ERROR: Unable to regenerate access token. Please try again

ERRORS.NAME: AI Bot name is required
ERRORS.VALID_URL: Please enter a valid URL starting with http:// or https://

WEBHOOK.DESCRIPTION: Configure a webhook bot to integrate with your custom services. The bot will receive and process events from conversations and can respond to them.
